title: Create a Project Wiki Page
description: An agent must create a new page in a project wiki (e.g., Confluence) summarizing a key project deliverable.

tasks.description: Analyze the deliverable document to extract its purpose, key findings, and final output.
Draft the content for the wiki page using markdown formatting, including headings, bullet points, and links.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent generates well-formatted content for the wiki.

tasks.description: Use a tool to publish the content to the project wiki under the correct parent page.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully creates the new wiki page.
